title: The Manoranjani Grand Diamond Haaram with Emerald and Ruby Accents
materials: meticulously studded with brilliant-cut diamonds (45.27 carats
129 pieces). Features a central emerald gemstone (3.85 carats
1 piece) and a vibrant ruby (2.90 carats
1 piece). Showcases the signature Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced brilliance.
features: A stunning symphony of traditional and contemporary design, this Haaram features intricate floral motifs embellished with diamonds. Delicate pink bead droppings add a touch of modern elegance. The central pendants showcasing square-cut emeralds evoke a regal aura. The use of floral motifs is a nod to South Indian heritage.
colors: with the rich green of the emerald
the passionate red of the ruby
and subtle lilac of tanzanite creating a harmonious and captivating color palette. The pink bead droppings add a gentle
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (muhurtham)
or any formal event where you desire to make a statement. Its modern flair also allows it to be worn at upscale galas and receptions.
description: This Haaram is a masterpiece of craftsmanship, blending the timeless elegance of traditional South Indian jewelry with contemporary design elements. The high-quality diamonds, emerald, and ruby exude luxury and sophistication. A true heirloom piece that symbolizes prosperity and joy, making it an invaluable addition to your jewelry collection.
